text: @RepAdamSchiff trump IS unfit for office.  It’s been 3.5 yrs and still know 0!  When he loses in Nov, criminal investigations should begin Jan 21, 2021 with all the junk he has pulled and no cronies to back him up.  His negligence to the American people and the coronavirus is abominable.
